snippet: The new guidelines were issued after the American Urology Association agreed to shift its stance on the screenings, which have often led to unnecessary cancer treatments.
lead_paragraph: The new guidelines were issued after the American Urology Association agreed to shift its stance on the screenings, which have often led to unnecessary cancer treatments.

headline.main: Looser Guidelines Issued on Prostate Screening
headline.print_headline: Fresh Guidelines on Prostate Cancer Screenings Recommend Fewer Tests
